name: HIPAA

details.regulator: HHS (U.S. Department of Health & Human Services)
details.requirement: PHI (Protected Health Information) Encryption at Rest & Transit
details.solution: AES-256 encryption, Access Logs, Secure Key Management

description: Ensures PHI is encrypted, access-controlled, and protected under privacy and security rules.

name: GDPR

details.requirement: Article 32 Data Protection for healthcare data
details.solution: Encryption, Access Control, Data Subject Rights, Right to Erasure

description: Mandates secure processing of personal healthcare data, including encryption and user rights.

name: ISO 27001

details.solution: Data encryption policies, risk assessments, cryptographic key management

description: A global standard for information security management systems, including encryption requirements.

name: HITRUST

details.solution: FIPS 140-2 certified encryption, Secure Key Management

description: Ensures organizations meet strict security and compliance controls for healthcare data.

name: PCI DSS
description: Protects payment data in healthcare transactions, requiring encryption of cardholder data.

name: DPA 2018 (UK GDPR)
description: The UK's version of GDPR, ensuring encryption and privacy of patient health data.

name: PIPEDA

details.regulator: Office of the Privacy Commissioner of Canada
details.solution: Encryption, Consent-Based Data Processing, Access Controls

description: Ensures that personal healthcare data is collected, used, and stored securely in Canada.

name: NDHB

details.regulator: National Digital Health Blueprint (NDHB) by NHA
details.solution: Encryption of health records, Unique Health IDs, Secure Data Sharing

description: Provides a framework for secure digital health data management in India.

name: DPDP Act

details.regulator: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY)
details.solution: Strong Encryption, Data Localization, Data Subject Rights

description: India's data protection law, which includes healthcare data security requirements.

name: APPI
description: Ensures secure handling and processing of healthcare-related personal information in Japan.

name: PDPA
description: Regulates the collection, use, and protection of healthcare personal data in Singapore.

name: My Health Record Act

details.solution: Strong Authentication, Encryption, Data Breach Notifications

description: Requires secure storage, encryption, and access control for Australia's national health records.

name: HITECH Act

details.regulator: HHS (U.S. Department of Health & Human Services)
details.solution: End-to-End Encryption, Audit Logs, Two-Factor Authentication

description: Expands HIPAA's requirements for the secure handling of Electronic Health Records.

name: LGPD
description: Brazil's data protection law, requiring healthcare data security and user consent.

name: CCPA

details.solution: Encryption, Data Access Logs, User Rights to Deletion

description: California's data privacy law, extending HIPAA-like protections to patient data.
